record.title: GENERAL LEAVE
record.narrative:
GENERAL LEAVE -- (House of Representatives - July 17, 2007)

[Page: H7874]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. Speaker, I ask unanimous consent that all Members may have 5 legislative days in which to revise and extend their remarks and include extraneous material during further consideration of H.R. 2641.

record.chair: Is there objection to the request of the gentleman from Indiana?
